# lyne-accordion


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                       | Type      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `light`  | `light`   | Set this if you want to render the light variant of the accordion. This is only allowed on non-white backgrounds. | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                    |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| `"unnamed"` | Place lyne-accordion-item elements in the slot |
